channel.title: Remote WebDriver on Seleniumドキュメント
channel.description: Recent content in Remote WebDriver on Seleniumドキュメント

item.title: Remote WebDriver server
item.description: ページは英語から日本語へ訳されています。 日本語は話せますか？プルリクエストをして翻訳を手伝ってください! The server will always run on the machine with the browser you want to test. The server can be used either from the command line or through code configuration. Starting the server from the command line Once you have downloaded selenium-server-standalone-{VERSION}.jar, place it on the computer with the browser you want to test. Then, from the directory with the jar, run the following: java -jar selenium-server-standalone-{VERSION}.

item.title: Remote WebDriver client
item.description: ページは英語から日本語へ訳されています。 日本語は話せますか？プルリクエストをして翻訳を手伝ってください! First, we need to connect to the RemoteWebDriver. We do this by pointing the URL to the address of the server running our tests. In order to customize our configuration, we set desired capabilities. Below is an example of instantiating a remote WebDriver object pointing to our remote web server, www.example.com, running our tests on Firefox. Java Python C# Ruby JavaScript Kotlin FirefoxOptions firefoxOptions = new FirefoxOptions(); WebDriver driver = new RemoteWebDriver(new URL("http://www.
